title: everything the cursor touches zooms ... how can I stop this auto zoom?
content:
'I just downloaded Firefox in an attempt to break away from Google stranglehold (I also switched to Protonmail and DuckDuckGo). My issue is that I was unaware that there is an autozoom feature with FF. While for some people this is probably a godsend, for me it is slowly, but surely, driving me crazy.

I have searched for the answer online but have not found the solution ... please tell me that there is a way to shut this feature off

matt
creator: mkirby25

title: Passwords lost during upgrade from 32 to 64 bit - please assist...
content:
I upgraded to 64 bit given my machine seemed to be up to spec to handle it, and hopefully avoid a lot of the crashing it's been doing lately. However, I lost my passwords. I have a password manager, but it was convenient with Firefox having them, and my cached sites, bookmarks, and other stuff. Not the end of the world, but would make my life easier having this back. Any ideas?

I looked through some articles to try and find the text or JSON files with this info, but no luck - either under the Firefox install files, or my Windows profile files. I also thought of uninstalling, just the 64 bit version, but not sure if the 32 bit will still be there when I'm done.

Unfortunately I never used the Mozilla/Firefox "sync" feature until now - so I didn't have them saved to the cloud. Any ideas?

Thanks, Tom
creator: tom.terenyi

title: Addon Settings Page open on Startup
content:
Hello,

Every once in a while, when I launch Firefox for the first time of the day, two of my add-ons' settings page open.

I have several add-ons but it happens to only these two.

They are:

AdGuard AdBlocker Youtube High Definition.

I know probably a refresh install is likely to solve it but I don't want to resort to that.

I'd appreciate your help.

Thanks.
creator: kh3ldar

title: firefox blocked my auto payment site, had to use Chrome to pay my bill!!
content:
I wanted to pay a bill and got this:

Secure Connection Failed An error occurred during a connection to mysubarumotorsfinance.com. Peer’s Certificate has been revoked. Error code: SEC_ERROR_REVOKED_CERTIFICATE 

   The page you are trying to view cannot be shown because the authenticity of the received data could not be verified.    Please contact the website owners to inform them of this problem.

Sure!!, let me call them and tell them to fix their certificate! Luckily I have Chrome, and I used Chrome with no problem to pay my damn bill!

In addition to this stupidity, every single time I log onto a website I have to turn off the tracking shield because if I don't, the website does not work. I disabled this in settings, but it just comes right back again. I don't care about a site on which I have to pay a bill tracking me or not. Firefox is becoming so unusable, I may as well just use Chrome from now on. What the hell happened to the browser I have been using for almost two decades???
creator: jeg

title: Webpage not displaying in chose language.
content: I am having a problem with Firefox displaying my home page, yahoo.com in English. I defaults to espanol. Cannot find a solution to this as I have tried most everything suggested, clean cache, website links. reset through troubleshooting, resetting modem, pc and router. This is pretty much a webpage problem and all links from that page. I do not have this issue with independent links from bookmarks. Or other Browsers like Chrome of IE. I use yahoo as my main Productivity center and would like your help fixing this issue.
creator: Wkimby

title: Firefox not opening, despite clean install of Windows
content:
I just got this new computer today, and I decide to install Firefox on it, only to find that it crashes when you attempt to open it. It will flash for just a millisecond before closing itself. It is a fresh install of Windows, and I have ran all of the troubleshooting on the Windows side to check for corruption and its all correct. I have even contacted Microsoft support to see if this is a compatibility issue. They suggested I contact Firefox support. Any help is greatly appreciated!

There are no other programs on the PC other than Firefox


Processor 11th Gen Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-11400 @ 2.60GHz 2.59 GHz GPU Nvidia GTX 1070 Installed RAM 16.0 GB (15.8 GB usable) System type 64-bit operating system, x64-based processor Edition Windows 10 Home Version 21H2 Installed on ‎3/‎2/‎2022 OS build 19044.1526 Experience Windows Feature Experience Pack 120.2212.4170.0

title: Stop Firefox Erasing history in Windows 11
content: When I restart or close Firefox (latest version for Windows 11) I loose all my tabs and history and start of with a fresh screen as If I just downloaded the ap. When I go to the Application Menu/History, there is no "restore previous session". I went all through this two days ago when it happened again and followed the "help" instructions. Those obviously didn't work. How do I stop Firefox from doing that? It didn't do it in Windows 10 before I upgraded to Windows 11. (I'm sorry I did that now because of all the time I've wasted.) Thanks for any help you can give me. Marv
creator: MarvBloos

title: 无法找到 “切换至本地服务”键，因此无法通过火狐通行证的方式登陆来同步账号
content:

请您指导一下我该如何解决这一问题。 我主要需求是希望把旧的Mac上的火狐浏览器的信息完全同步到新的Mac上。 谢谢！

title: Firefox se cae a cada rato
content: Hola, cuando uso firefox se me cierran las páginas a cada rato, las páginas se pueden quedar en blanco o se cierran inesperadamente. Esta situación ocurre en modo normal como en modo seguro. También se desconfiguran las páginas y aparecen textos con mensajes erróneos. Adjunto imagen. Además, las id de los errores comienzan con bp... por ejemplo: bp-6b5f59e2-3a9a-40dd-9695-1138e0220301
creator: k.apt

title: Mozilla doesn't recognize certificate issuer
content:
A site that I use several times every year recently wouldn't open. Response from Firefox is "Access Denied - Certificate issuer not recognized". Also kept getting bumped out of my email account and all my open tabs would close abruptly. The last may have been rectified but I still can't get into the website I want to access.

I've tried different browsers as well so I don't know if it's Mozilla only or my PC. Even if I type in https://www.(pagename).com, it displays as you don't have permission to access http://www.(pagename).com.

I changed nothing on my PC that would cause the problem.
creator: Bcamp

title: Email content on Google are blank since Firefox UPDATES installed 18Feb2022 for firefox 97.0.1

How to remove updates firefox 97.0.1 but don't know if this will fix as problem only exists on my GMAIL EMAIL ACCOUNTS. SEE SCREENSHOT. email inbox content not visible they are blank

All my emails are blank. They have s header and who they are from but no text just a blank screen. This is the same for sent and recieved messaged. Really do not know how to fix this

Having the same issue, All emails received on all the email accounts I have on this device (including work email), are blank.. In addition, mails from every other day are also blank.

Only shows sender information, subject, attachment.

If I try to RESPOND or REPLY to email, I can click the three dots below reply and finally see content. Otherwise screen is blank, except for header and subject!!!!

title: Email Draft Issues
content:
I mainly use Firefox as my browser and use Microsoft Outlook for my university email. I already contacted university tech support and Microsoft Outlook tech support and neither was able to provide me with a solution except for suggesting it could be a browser issue.

When I draft an email, as I am typing the email will delete itself, archive itself, or try to set up some weird category system that I didn't initiate. It has become impossible to draft emails online for this reason because I never know when something might erase or delete as I type. I do not have any issues typing on other websites, including using Gmail.

Has anyone else had this issue before with Outlook?
creator: a314acosta
